bugs.title: CVE-2022-28327 golang: crypto/elliptic: panic caused by oversized scalar [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2022-28327 golang: crypto/elliptic: panic caused by oversized scalar [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2022-28327 golang: crypto/elliptic: panic caused by oversized scalar

long_desc.thetext:
crypto/elliptic: tolerate all oversized scalars in generic P-256

A crafted scalar input longer than 32 bytes can cause P256().ScalarMult or P256().ScalarBaseMult to panic. Indirect uses through crypto/ecdsa and crypto/tls are unaffected. amd64, arm64, ppc64le, and s390x are unaffected.

This was discovered thanks to a Project Wycheproof test vector.

This is CVE-2022-28327 and https://go.dev/issue/52075.
patch is here: https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/go/+/397135/

bugs.title: CVE-2022-24675 golang: encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2022-24675 golang: encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2022-24675 golang: encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode

long_desc.thetext:
encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode

A large (more than 5 MB) PEM input can cause a stack overflow in Decode, leading the program to crash.

Thanks to Juho Nurminen of Mattermost who reported the error.

This is CVE-2022-24675 and https://go.dev/issue/51853.
Patch is here: https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/go/+/399816/

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2022-24675 golang-github-openprinting-ipp-usb: golang: encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode [fedora-35]
CVE-2022-24675 golang: encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode

long_desc.thetext:
encoding/pem: fix stack overflow in Decode

A large (more than 5 MB) PEM input can cause a stack overflow in Decode, leading the program to crash.

Thanks to Juho Nurminen of Mattermost who reported the error.

This is CVE-2022-24675 and https://go.dev/issue/51853.
Patch is here: https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/go/+/399816/
